<!-- beginCustomHeader -->

## Description

Set the target on fire on hit
<!-- beginCustomDescription -->
<!-- endCustomDescription -->

## Properties

* cost

  * Type: int
  * Default: 0

  Durability cost of the power.

* burntime

  * Type: int
  * Default: 20

  Duration of the fire, in ticks
